content.rendered:
VTP Hilife: Modern Living in the Heart of Wakad, Pune

Discover contemporary living at VTP Hilife, a residential project by VTP Realty located in the bustling neighborhood of Wakad, Pune. Spread across a sprawling 4.5 acres of prime land, this project offers 1, 2, and 3 BHK apartments designed to provide a comfortable and modern lifestyle.

Key Project Details:

  • Size and Configurations: Choose from a range of thoughtfully designed apartments, starting at a spacious 531.52 sq.ft.
  • Amenities and Facilities: Immerse yourself in a world of convenience with top-notch amenities, including a clubhouse, gymnasium, swimming pool, children’s play area, and beautifully landscaped gardens. Embrace a holistic lifestyle with unique features like the Acupressure Park, Swimming Pool, and Golf Course.
  • Project Layout: VTP Hilife boasts a well-planned layout with 6 towers, each soaring 20 floors high. The project is divided into 3 distinct phases, ensuring a harmonious blend of design and functionality.

Location Advantages:

Situated strategically in Wakad, VTP Hilife offers easy access to essential facilities such as schools, hospitals, and shopping centers. The proximity to Wakad chowk metro station, Chaphekar Chowk, and Pimpri railway station ensures seamless connectivity to various transit points.

Real Estate Trends:

Stay ahead in the real estate market with VTP Hilife. The property prices in the locality have witnessed a significant 12.2% change in the last quarter, indicating a lucrative investment opportunity. Moreover, the overall property prices in the area have increased by 1.4% in the last quarter.

Community Living:

Experience the charm of community living with around 689 units on offer. Engage in a vibrant neighborhood with like-minded individuals, fostering a sense of belonging within the 3 distinct phases of VTP Hilife.

Landmarks and Accessibility:

Notable landmarks like Ushakiran Eye Hospital enhance the project’s appeal. The Wakad chowk metro station stands out as the closest transit point, providing easy connectivity for residents.

In conclusion, VTP Hilife stands as a testament to modern living, offering a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and connectivity. With positive reviews from satisfied customers and a strategic location in Wakad, Pune, this residential project is an ideal choice for those seeking a contemporary and upscale lifestyle. Invest in VTP Hilife and elevate your living experience in Pune.

Spread over 7.56 acres, Anika Piccadilly is a blend of comfort and convenience, making it an ideal choice for homebuyers.

title.rendered: Indraneel by Sonam Builders | Luxurious 2 & 3 BHK Flats in Mira Road East, Thane

content.rendered:
Discover Indraneel by Sonam Builders, an exquisite residential project located on Mari Gold Road, Beverly Park, Mira Road East, Thane. Designed to offer the epitome of comfort and sophistication, Indraneel blends modern amenities with sustainable living solutions to cater to the needs of discerning homebuyers.

Why Choose Indraneel?

1. Prime Location üìç: Indraneel is strategically located in Mira Road East, Thane, offering easy access to essential services, schools, hospitals, and entertainment hubs.

2. Exceptional Building Amenities üè¢:

  • Impressive Structure: A towering 27-storey residential building with Ground Floor + 4 Podiums + Amenity Floor + Service Floor.
  • Elevator Convenience: 4 high-speed automatic elevators ensuring swift vertical mobility.
  • Grand Entrance: A grand-height entrance lobby to welcome you home.
  • Spacious Design: Floor-to-floor heights of 3.15 meters (10.33 feet) for a sense of openness and luxury.
  • Covered Parking: Secure and ample covered car parking spaces for residents.

3. Luxurious Lifestyle Amenities üèãÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüçøüèä‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è:

  • Fitness & Wellness: A massive gym with weight lifting and cardio areas, a dedicated yoga room, and a swimming pool with a separate kids‚Äô pool.
  • Entertainment & Leisure: Enjoy a luxurious movie theater, library, kids’ zone, and multi-purpose lawn.
  • Games & Recreation: Carrom, chess, table tennis, pool table, and a cricket turf for endless fun.
  • Social Spaces: Banquet on the terrace, walking track, and senior citizen lawn.
  • Modern Facilities: Indoor children‚Äôs play area, EV charger, and more.

4. Advanced Safety & Security üîí:

  • 24/7 Surveillance: CCTV coverage in common areas and a central security control room.
  • Emergency Preparedness: DG power backup and state-of-the-art fire fighting equipment ensure safety and security.

5. Sustainable Living Features üåç:

  • Eco-Friendly Design: Incorporates environmentally friendly construction practices.
  • Water Management: Rainwater harvesting and an STP (Sewage Treatment Plant) for efficient water use.
  • Energy Efficiency: Solar system integration for reduced energy consumption.

6. Elegant Apartment Features üõãÔ∏è:

  • Luxurious Interiors: Italian marble in entrance, dining, and living areas; wooden flooring in the master bedroom; vitrified tiles in other bedrooms.
  • Modern Bathrooms: Designer tiles, branded CP fittings, solar water connection in the master bathroom, and geysers in all bathrooms.
  • Functional Design: Modular kitchen with hob and chimney, aluminum sliding windows with mosquito nets, and intercom with video door phone.
  • Comfort Features: AC points in all rooms and telephone and TV sockets in each room.

7. Carpet Areas üìè:

  • 2 BHK Jodi: 1655.59 SQFT
  • 2 BHK: 823.98 SQFT
  • 3 BHK: 1519.11 SQFT

RERA No.: P51700027465

title.rendered: Paranjape Gloria Grand – Premium Apartments in Bavdhan, Pune

content.rendered:
Paranjape Gloria Grand, an under-construction residential project by Paranjape Schemes Construction Ltd., is located in Bavdhan, Pune West. Spread over 2.25 acres, this housing society offers 267 premium 2, 3, and 4 BHK apartments designed for modern living. With an expected possession in December 2026, Paranjape Gloria Grand is RERA registered (P52100001380) and boasts a range of lifestyle amenities. Its strategic location ensures excellent connectivity to Pune’s key landmarks, making it a desirable investment for homebuyers.

Features & Amenities:

  • Spread over 2.25 acres with 267 units
  • 2 towers with 17 floors each
  • Amenities: Swimming Pool, Reflexology Park, Lawn Tennis Court
  • Close to Chellaram Hospital, Vanaz Metro Station, and Anand Nagar Metro Station
  • Property price appreciation in Bavdhan by 1.2% in the last quarter

Connectivity:

  • Landmarks: Opposite Ambrosia Resort, near Chandani Chowk, Paud Road, Bavdhan
  • Metro Stations: Vanaz Metro Station (nearest), Anand Nagar Metro Station
  • Nearby Amenities: Chellaram Hospital, educational institutions, and marketplaces within walking distance
  • Public Transport: Well-connected via public transport, easy availability of cabs/auto

Configuration Details:

About the Builder:
Paranjape Schemes Construction Ltd. is a renowned real estate developer in Pune, with 58 completed projects, 12 upcoming, and 17 ongoing developments. Known for quality construction and timely delivery, the builder has established a strong presence in Pune West.

RERA Number: P52100001380

title.rendered: The Ridges 41 – Luxurious 2, 3 & 4 BHK Apartments in Blue Ridge Town, Hinjewadi

content.rendered:
Welcome to The Ridges 41, a premium residential development by Paranjape Schemes Construction Ltd. Located in Blue Ridge Town, Hinjewadi Rajiv Gandhi Infotech Park, Pune West, this upcoming project offers luxurious 2, 3, and 4 BHK apartments. With excellent connectivity, modern amenities, and proximity to key landmarks, The Ridges 41 promises a contemporary lifestyle amidst serene surroundings. RERA-registered with the ID P52100055581, this project is expected to be delivered by December 2029.

Features & Amenities:

  • Spread over 2.29 acres of land
  • Comprises 3 towers with 41 floors
  • Swimming Pool, Theater Home, and Lounge for relaxation
  • Proximity to Sanjeevani Hospital
  • Nearest metro station: Wakad Chowk
  • Offers stunning views and ample natural light

Connectivity:

  • 500 m to Radisson Blu Pune Hinjewadi
  • 2 km to Xion Mall
  • 2.1 km to Sanjeevani Multispeciality Hospital
  • 20.1 km to Pune Railway Station
  • 24.1 km to Pune International Airport
  • 12.1 km to PCMC Metro Station
  • Close to NH 48, I2IT Engineering College, and Mahindra International School

Configuration Details:

About the Builder:

Paranjape Schemes Construction Ltd is a well-established real estate developer with over 37 years of experience. The company has successfully delivered 58 projects and has 18 projects under construction. Known for ethical business practices and customer satisfaction, Paranjape Schemes has earned the trust of 75,000+ families.

RERA Number:

P52100055581

  • Podium-Level Landscaping: Enjoy beautifully landscaped podium-level green spaces that bring tranquility to your daily life. üåøüèûÔ∏è

  • Ample Parking: Six levels of designated parking‚Äîspace for your car and plenty for your guests too. üöóüÖøÔ∏è

‚ú® 4 BHK Apartments

  • Carpet Area: 1600 Sq.Ft.

  • Perfect for: Large families seeking opulent and spacious living spaces. üè∞üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶‚ú®

‚ú® Why Choose Ridges 41? ‚ú®

  • üåç Prime Location: Situated in Hinjewadi, Pune’s vibrant IT hub, with easy access to offices, schools, shopping, and entertainment. üè¢üéíüõçÔ∏è
  • üåø Sustainable Living: Designed for vertical living that balances nature and modern comfort with sustainable practices. üå±üèôÔ∏è
